scripts.build: rimraf ./server/dist && babel -e graphql,ql,js ./server/src --out-dir ./server/dist --copy-files --presets=es2015,react,es2016,stage-2,stage-0 && rimraf ./common/dist && babel -e graphql,ql,js ./common/src --out-dir ./common/dist --copy-files --presets=es2015,react,es2016,stage-2,stage-0 && rimraf ./connector/dist && babel -e graphql,ql,js ./connector/src --out-dir ./connector/dist --copy-files --presets=es2015,react,es2016,stage-2,stage-0
